modules.description: Constructs and executes image processing expressions by combining pixel operations, managing input and output image contexts, and handling asynchronous execution. Operates on image types, pixel expressions, and input sources to generate output images. Used to merge multiple pixel operations into a single pipeline, evaluate pre-defined expressions, and render images based on specified dimensions and color configurations.

Provides operations for loading, saving, and manipulating images using bigarrays, including pixel-wise transformations and color space conversions. Works with image data structured as 2D arrays of pixel values, typically represented as 8-bit or 32-bit unsigned integers. Used to apply filters, resize images, and convert between RGB and grayscale formats.

Combines pixel operations into executable image processing pipelines, handling asynchronous execution and input/output contexts. Processes image types, pixel expressions, and input sources to generate output images based on defined parameters. Supports merging multiple operations into a single workflow, evaluating pre-defined expressions, and rendering images with specified dimensions and color settings. Examples include blending layers, applying filters, and generating thumbnails.
